MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK10 postcode area of Clackmannan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:23pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Brucefield Crescent substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25pm on Saturday, 20 March 2021
